website_summaries.verdict: An acceptable choice with some user-friendly features. A close competitor of other top models.
pros: Leash tape (16 ft.) is rugged yet retracts smoothly
We love the attractive styling and attached waste bag dispenser
cons: The stop/brake button has a tendency to become touchy after frequent use

website_summaries.verdict: A sound option if you need a basic dog leash that's built to last and will fit your budget – you won't find a better choice.
pros: A durable, extra-long 16-ft. retractable leash that accommodates dogs up to 110 lbs
Has a no-slip comfort grip and easy-to-control lever
Comes with dog waste bags and dispenser
cons: It's pricey and a bit bulky, and it's not ideal for controlling unruly dogs

customer_reviews.title: Great product at great price
customer_reviews.text: I will never buy a pet store leash again. This is twice as durable at half the price. Very strong with no tangle leash. After having several $30 leashes break I am very happy with this one.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Good for a puller
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good. I bought it for my husky. She pulls a lot and I thought let's give her some freedom and get a longer leash. I was looking for something strong where she cannot break and long. I was looking for 20 ft but this works fine. And it's pretty good. It looks like it's will do the job. It is heavy and the actual leash looks strong. But week see. I have used it for 2 walks. One of which had a rabbit incident and she started pulling and it was pretty durable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Slow and heavy
customer_reviews.text: Heavier then normal leash. Also recoils very slow. It was so slow that the 1st time I used it my dog came running up to me and looked down at the cord as is was still on the ground winding up and then looked up at we and looked at me like "What's with this?" I actually stopped using it and started just using the old leash cause it works better.
customer_reviews.author: Boogy

customer_reviews.title: Locking mechanism warrants a 1 star despite other qualities of the leash.
customer_reviews.text: While the leash rope is of higher quality than other retractable leashes I've owned the locking mechanism is so bad that I have to give this a single star. Merely pushing the button down is not enough to stop a dog (30lb husky puppy) running from you. If I didn't fully lock it by pushing the button forward after pushing it down the leash would overpower the locking mechanism. I would not feel safe running my puppy near a busy street in case I needed to stop him immediately to keep him from running into the street
customer_reviews.author: David Dziak

customer_reviews.title: This is a NO....
customer_reviews.text: I love retractable leashes and I wanted to love this one. But it fell short. The button to top to stop the retraction COMPLETELY sucks and constantly gets stuck. I already had to replace this with another leash from Petco, wouldn't recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Ababe

customer_reviews.title: Steer clear and find a better leash. Don't let the number of reviews fool you.
customer_reviews.text: Genuine POS. I had this for all of two whole days before the brake/ lock decided they didn't want to hold fast, letting the leash click through. Shame since the size is nice and the leash width is great, feeling very strong. Unfortunately the main body of the leash which houses the mechanicism sounds all super plasticy and with a single button for lock/ brake/ go, in guessing the gears just get misaligned or something to that degree. I will be returning this product immediately. Steer clear and find a better leash. Don't let the number of reviews fool you.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t last
customer_reviews.text: Bought this leash very comfortable but did not last the retractable part quit working and only had a few months bought in August and broke in October. After the company read my review they contacted me via email and mailed me a new leash in January so far I have had no problems with this leash the customer service is great they definitely follow up and want you to be satisfied
customer_reviews.author: Annie

customer_reviews.title: Good product, Great customer service
customer_reviews.text: **UPDATE** After writing my original review (below), someone from the company reached out via email to apologize and make sure they had the proper address to send a replacement. Not only did they promptly send a replacement leash, but they followed up to make sure I was satisfied with the replacement once it arrived. It was refreshing to receive such exceptional customer service and it’s great to see that they genuinely stand behind their product. Original review: Bought this 8 months ago, used about once a day for short walks with a mellow golden retriever. The retraction mechanism suddenly stopped working, rendering it useless. Up until now it was fine, very disappointed in the quality
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa C

customer_reviews.title: This thing is junk. I have 4 golden retrievers ...
customer_reviews.text: This thing is junk. I have 4 golden retrievers I walk a day and by day 5 the lock leash button started stripping. Taotronics spent more on the fancy box it comes in more than the leash. I have had it for about a month and the stop button has final given out and will no longer disengage. Pick some other leash IMO.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Graham

customer_reviews.title: Falling apart already
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this in January to replace a nearly 10 year leash. At first it was very nice, but now, the handle material is peeling, the lock mechanism is taking two hands to secure (and even then sometimes lets go) and the hook to grab my Beagle's harness is too small, makin it hard to get on and off. Looks like a good buy but in the end, it wasn't. Try another brand.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Did not last
customer_reviews.text: Bought this leash in hopes it would be durable and not rip near the latch. We have a 45lb Mini Aussie, who pulls once in a while, but is not super active. Figured this leash would be a great option. Unfortunately, with less than ONE MONTH of use, the leash is ripping down by the latch. I would love to say this leash had a lot of use in that one month, but ultimately we've probably used it maybe 10 times in that month. Very disappointed with the quality.
customer_reviews.author: Dakota Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Great Leash for Larger Dogs
customer_reviews.text: I bought this leash for my 20 lb poodle mix and was impressed with the quality, packaging and workmanship of this leash. It has a tape rather than a cord type of lead. The only problem I had is that it is too big for my needs. This leash would be perfect for a larger dog and I have no doubt it would give long service. Because my dog is only 20 lbs and doesn't pull on the leash, he didn't ever try to go away from me as the tension on the rewind is set up for a bigger dog. IF you have a 40 pound dog, or heavier, this is the leash for you.
customer_reviews.author: Leah McIntyre

customer_reviews.title: Best Present Ever for A Pet Owner
customer_reviews.text: I "dogsat" my son's 30lb pure muscle French Bulldog puppy. My son brought his standard sized dog leash for me to walk him. My 2nd day I ordered this leash on sameday delivery. Gucci "LOVED" this leash as he could investiage everything that I didnt want to! On the phone, I told my son a out it and he was "just OK" or nonchalant with it. 2 weeks after he took Gucci home he said to me that this leash was the BEST PRESENT ever! He said that it changed Gucci's and his own life. Gucci is a much more happy and fun loving STRONG 1yr old Puppy!
customer_reviews.author: Gary R

customer_reviews.title: Just as good as those costing 2x ( or more )
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a backup leash because my dog frequently chews through them. I paid about 2.5x this for a very similar model at a retail store close by. There's a slight difference in the smoothness of the retractor and the leash line is less of nylon material and more coated plastic. However, this leash has worked great. I've walked the dog about 10 times. No snagged cords and I'm constantly releasing and pulling in the line as I walk with zero issues. I will be buying another leash or two just to have on hand.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne Schulz

customer_reviews.title: A little fragile
customer_reviews.text: Dog was able to chew through the thin leash almost immediately. Works as advertised but the leash is too fragile for a large dog with large teeth if he grabs it with his mouth for a moment UPDATE: After posting my review of this leash, the manufacturer contacted me and went above and beyond my expectations to replace this leash. I would definitely recommend doing business with them again as they truly stand behind their product. I upgraded my original review from three to four stars based on the exceptional customer service! Replacement leash is working well and we are much more careful to prevent another problem.
customer_reviews.author: jb

customer_reviews.title: The second one we bought
customer_reviews.text: We use this for our Shih Tsu. We liked the first one we bought so well that we bought a second identical one so that we could have one handy upstairs or downstairs by the backdoor. The first one we have owned for a year and a half and it is still working well. I like the way it locks and retracts and the length of 15 feet allows her to have some space to play and decide that perfect spot to do her business. I like the attached carrier for potty bags as well. I don't have to worry about having some handy because if I have the least, I always have the bags handy as well.
customer_reviews.author: Lucrenda

customer_reviews.title: Updated Review
customer_reviews.text: Updated-See below. The seller has great pride in making sure the customers are happy with the products sold. After posting the original review with the TaoTronics leash in which I indicated dissatisfaction, the seller contacted me to inquire what would make me happy with the purchase. The seller sent a leash that requires no hands (connects around the waist) which is very nice and functional. This leash has flexibility yet not enough for the dog to get too far ahead and facilitates walking two dogs very easily. This is a great leash and the sellers action was appreciated very much. This was great customer service by the seller in making sure I was satisfied and happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: avirtualcfo

customer_reviews.title: We decided to buy another for our other dog because it worked so well & the quality is very good- the rope on it is very strong & the grip is comfortable. We have a 90 pound 8 month old ...
customer_reviews.text: This is our second time buying this product. We got one for one of our dogs who loves to roam but we cannot let her off the leash as we can't catch her sometimes. We decided to buy another for our other dog because it worked so well & the quality is very good- the rope on it is very strong & the grip is comfortable. We have a 90 pound 8 month old german Shepard who isn't easy to control at the moment so this leash works well if we need it to be short or long for him to sniff around.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I did love it at first but since it broke within the ...
customer_reviews.text: After one week of use, my 7 pound, 3 month old dog broke the leash. I hope you guys can send a replacement leash since you guys promised the leash was going to be strong enough to deal with a 110 lb dog. I did love it at first but since it broke within the first week, i am really unhappy and unsatisfied. I hope you guys can send a replacement leash. Update: They sent me a replacement leash after learning about my first one breaking! Great service!
customer_reviews.author: Xiomara Vazquez

customer_reviews.title: Broke In 5 Weeks
customer_reviews.text: After 5 weeks of regular use, the lock feature suddenly stopped working. I found this out the hard way, as my bulldog puppy decided to lunge off the curb and into Mid-town Manhattan traffic. Fortunately I was able to stop the cord manually before he got too far. I'm replacing this leash with a similar product from another company which is hopefully safer. Be warned.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie Mathison

customer_reviews.title: Good leash, with at least typical durability
customer_reviews.text: The first leash I received froze up after a month. They sent me a new one quickly, which was great customer service. The second leash lasted about 18 months, so that is better than the other retractable leashes I have tried over the past few years. My dog is only 12 pounds, though, so your mileage may vary!
customer_reviews.author: J. Shea

customer_reviews.title: Very impressive
customer_reviews.text: I can see why this retractable leash is rated high in all of the reviews that I read. It is well made and sturdy. Seems like a keeper and I am not worried about it snapping like some others I have purchased. I paid more than double $$ for the WalkAbout leash and they both broke after about 1 month of daily use. I use a lot of leashes and I am hard on them because I walk dogs all day in my business but this leash seems very promising so far. I love the warranty too.
customer_reviews.author: Susan E.

customer_reviews.title: It works great for big and small dogs
customer_reviews.text: This leash is very strong. I take my 65 pound dog for a walk and he tends to pull when walking, So I extend the leash enough for him to run and use the lock feature so he does not go too far. It is easy to lock and unlock with one push . It has a wide grip area. It works great..
customer_reviews.author: HS

customer_reviews.title: Move on to the next leash...!
customer_reviews.text: What do I dislike about this leash... let’s count the many things. The handle is too small to hold with all four average-size male fingers. The locking mechanism is very poorly made. The leash fabric gets twisted up as it retracts causing a jam. And lastly the darned thing snapped tonight right at the plastic coupler/cover at the clasp. My dog ran directly out into the road. It’s a wonder he wasn’t killed. My dog is 5 month old golden doodle. Strong, but not terribly big yet. I’ve used this leash intermittently for about four months. Do NOT consider this product.
customer_reviews.author: MJ

customer_reviews.title: Very Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I found this via Wire Cutter and was so excited when it arrived. We have a puppy - who granted does tend to chew on leashes (we're working on it) - but this thing didn't even last two brief potty trips to the front yard. The ribbon disintegrated in no time (less than an hours worth of leash time). My dollar store emergency leash has held up just fine in comparison. I'm honestly shocked.
customer_reviews.author: KMR

customer_reviews.title: Seller won't respond to emails about wrong item sent
customer_reviews.text: The harness cord is cool, it broke after a month of use, cord just stopped pulling itself back in and my dog is only 45 pounds. The seller tried to appease me with a stronger leash that was actually a 6 ft long bungee cord with no where to put your hands. Both ends have a clasp to attach to the dog, as if I only want to use my waste to walk my dog. Now I can't get them to respond to me regarding a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Rain

customer_reviews.title: strong enough for my beast
customer_reviews.text: I have an 80lb pitbull who I've had to yank back countless times or has gone after a squirrel at full speed. This leash has reached it's max length with force countless times. No issues, no breaking, nada. The dog has even chewed some of the cable so it's slightly frayed, and still no issues with strength. The only annoying thing was the poop bag holder which fell off a bunch is now lost. I have a different one from a previous leash on here and it has stayed put, so I think it's the one these guys sell that isn't that good.
customer_reviews.author: A. A.

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't Lock Firmly in Place
customer_reviews.text: I will have to return this unfortunately. For one thing, it sits a little heavy in my hand, but the main issue is that when the leash is "locked"--meaning my dog is in it and shouldn't be able to go any further--the leash will still feed out a little bit when she pulls. I have a medium sized dog who isn't aggressive, but gets excited when she sees other dogs and wants to run toward them. I put the lock into locked position, but she is still able to keep pulling on the leash, and this risks her being able to get too close to another dog. Basically, this leash does not do what a retractable leash needs to do.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made, but might work for a small dog
customer_reviews.text: Poo bags are poor quality - the bottom seam of the bag gives way very easily, so I had to knot both ends of the bags to keep things from falling out. Then after two weeks of steady use the leash broke. My dog’s not much of a puller, might tug for a few minutes early in the walk but then settles down, but this leash still couldn’t take it. The tether frayed and broke right before at the metal latch, so my dog ran free for a while. This might pass for a small dog, but it did not stand up to standard wear and tear with a 65lb dog.
customer_reviews.author: Ev

customer_reviews.title: Bring another leash just in case this thing rips
customer_reviews.text: I bought this retractable leash because I love the color and it had a decent amount of good reviews. Do not buy this leash you will be highly disappointed this leash ripped even though I had a pinch collar my dog is not that big is a 35 lb Doberman pappy. I had to run around the park to try to get him and I had to tie the two pieces together so I could settle in hold him.
customer_reviews.author: Alex G

customer_reviews.title: Not a perfect alternative to Flexi.
customer_reviews.text: Nice sturdy device bought to replace two Flexis which were no match for my Brittany (and on which return they were too cheap to pay for). Two significant criticisms however: the retraction speed of the cord is very slow, thereby reducing prompt control of the dog. The space for the fingers--even on the large size--is too small for a man's hand, especially while wearing gloves. A third concern just became visable on the unit I bought a month ago. The plastic on the hand piecehas begun to fray and peel. I am concerned about the unit's longevity. Finally the clip is too small for male hands; in cold weather it cannot be clipped or unclipped in gloves.
customer_reviews.author: Peter B. Tatiner

customer_reviews.title: Seller Delivers On Warranty-Apparent Manufacturing Defect
customer_reviews.text: We are on our fourth retractable TaoTronics leash. The locking mechanism has failed on two of the leashes in less than four months; however, THE SELLER REPLACES THE BROKEN LEASHES QUICKLY AND PROFESSIONALLY. I’m not clear why they fail, but they are great when they work. UPDATE: This leash is great, until it isn’t. We have had five failed leashes since June 2019. Giving up and going another direction. TaoTronics has a manufacturing issue and hasn’t corrected it. The leash locks up and then it’s worthless.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Poor bone dispenser attachment/Design flaw/Torn up rubber handle
customer_reviews.text: It arrived and it seemed fine. However, the attachment/bone that dispenses the pickup bags is a design flaw. My hands are larger than the average dogwalker, but the attachment adversely affects the ergonomic function. It's a let down since I was looking forward to having the bone dispenser attached, but will have it detached to provide ample space for my hand to hold the leash handle. UPDATE: My 1 year old mutt tore offer the rubberized handle, to my dismay, so although it now has a little more hand space, it's not as comfortable as I'd like.
customer_reviews.author: Nick H.

customer_reviews.title: Reliable, strong retractable leash
customer_reviews.text: After 9 months this is still going. It jammed once but with some work, was able to get retract the lease again. It doesn't lock easily as others but I rarely use this feature. With a strong 45# Aussie who pulls, was worried the collar attachment would snap but not yet. The handle is only sign of wear in that it peels off in layers. No wear on the nylon. It's been caught in rain and retracted so developed a smell. After soaking in bleach and dried, it still looks good. Never lost the bag carrier so pleased other than handle peeling off.
customer_reviews.author: ASmith

customer_reviews.title: Cheap, Cheap, Cheap
customer_reviews.text: Metal clasp is 1 inch of cheap chrome plated tin. This is not the clasp you would want on a leash for a large dog. The opening on the clasp is so small it will not even attach to the harness purchased from amazon for medium - large dogs. I will add this to the ever increasing list of absolutely terrible items sold on Amazon. Getting very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Connolly

customer_reviews.title: Best retractable leash
customer_reviews.text: I have been using retractable leashes for more than 15 years. During that time, I had probably had 5-6 different leashes. Hands down, this one is the best. You can tell immediately that it is well made. The leash mechanism is smooth and noiseless. The nylon tape leash seems stronger than what I have normally experienced. The stopping mechanism is quick and sure. The whole feel is right. I like that the leash can be used with dogs up to 100 lb. My dog weighs less than half that but who knows what a future dog will weigh in at and I expect to have this leash for years.
customer_reviews.author: Irene

customer_reviews.title: cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: The weight felt good in my hand. The grip was comfortable. But I had this leash for less than 3 moths before an internal mechanism broke and it no longer retracted. I was outside the 30-day return policy on Amazon (and it was a Christmas gift). So I bought a second, identical leash, filed for a return, and sent in the first one that was broken. Less than three months later the second leash also broke. Also, I hated the lock and release buttons. The ribbon leash appeared to be a good idea, but din't work so great. After a couple weeks, the return was a little sluggish and didn't always fully retract
customer_reviews.author: kurt

customer_reviews.title: My safety is a priority...it could have gotten my dog run over
customer_reviews.text: The spring and locking mechanisms on this leash has broken twice in the last month and I only bought it 3 months ago. Of course I'm now out of warranty / return ability now. This morning was the second time that it malfunctioned and I wound up getting dragged down the street, pavement, with my dog because the leash did not work in locking. I have bloody palms, elbows and knees as a result. I would not buy this product again. UPDATE: The company saw my review and did issue a refund. They also offered a replacement unit but I declined.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn B.

customer_reviews.title: Won't last.
customer_reviews.text: Lasted only 10-months when the retract system locked. Very dissatisfied. Update: I sent my request for a replacement at no charge and I received a response the same day offering a free replacement. If you request a replacement make sure you keep the broken unit or right down the model number displayed on the side of the leash.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Locks well, quality lead
customer_reviews.text: I like it and would have given 5 stars, but the grip should be a little wider for larger hands. My hands are probably between medium and large (male) and do not fully fit through the grip. Otherwise great product.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Schnelker

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this leash on September 3, 2018 and only 7 weeks later, it's already jammed and will no longer retract. We use this leash 3-4 times per week. We purchased a much cheaper leash at a discount store that's lasted for over a year, so I don't think it's an issue with my 40 lb dog. Note: They've lowered the cost so it might be more reasonable now.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Handle is a little small fir someone with big hands, but it's not too bad. The retractable cord squeeks a little at first going in and out, but that wears off. The lock button works pretty well..... all in all i like it.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin C

customer_reviews.title: This TaoTronics leash is the best. When you pick it up you know that ...
customer_reviews.text: Over the past six years I've had at least four different brands of retractable dog leash's. This TaoTronics leash is the best. When you pick it up you know that it's well made. The mechanism is quiet and smooth and operates without a hitch. The only suggestion I would make to the manufacturer is to make the hand hold a bit bigger. I have to use the leash in a cold climate area and must wear gloves. The hand hold is a little snug with gloves on. I'm happy to give this a five star rating and recommend it highly.
customer_reviews.author: JBG

customer_reviews.title: 17 months of heavy use
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for 17 months. The weak point is the spring for the locking button which snapped in half. We definitely used the button a lot for every walk (60lb dog). For $13 I got my money's worth from it. The leash material is very durable. I kept it to use as a yard tether during bath time for the pup. Unfortunately I couldnt take it apart to replace the spring, but again it was cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Sir Arthur

customer_reviews.title: Dang dog chewed the leash again!!
customer_reviews.text: The leash appears to be similar in functionality to other leashes. Comfortable grip/lock and smooth retraction action. The clasp should be a bit bigger as it can sometimes be frustrating to attach to dog collar. Had an older leash with larger clasp and easier to attach to collar. I know that all retractable nylon leashes are susceptible to being chewed by their dog. It took our dog about 10 seconds (when we were not watching) to just about chew through the leash. This is the second leash she has tried to bite through. If there is a better solution to this problem I have not seen it.
customer_reviews.author: Kulgpa

customer_reviews.title: This has been a really great retractable leash
customer_reviews.text: This has been a really great retractable leash. We walk our dog several times a day and it's been nothing but a great, high quality product. I really liked the attachable doggie bag holder, too---it's GREAT for picking up after the dog on walks. The bags that come with the bag holder initially are pretty low quality but that's easily fixed by getting some new bags from your local walmart or pet store. I don't foresee this leash breaking any time soon, but I would definitely purchase another in the distant future.
customer_reviews.author: swalke90

customer_reviews.title: Good quality product
customer_reviews.text: Very strong and sturdy. I didnt give it 5 stars for 2 reasons: the first is that the picture is deceiving in that it looks like you are going to get the poop dispenser bags with it but you dont and secondly bc I dont really find the lock feature that extraordinary. However, I will say that if you have a small to medium dog it is perfect and very good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: Leash is exactly what I was expecting. It feels *slightly* cheap but given the price that's just fine by me. I was tired of spending too much money replacing more expensive retractable leashes so I went for this one instead. It works great for us! The bags that come with it are very thin compared to the bags I already use, so for me, those will have to get tossed in the trash. But the bag holder is great and very convenient.
customer_reviews.author: Greg A

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Was on time and seems to work good. On a side note, kinda wish the people that deliver the packages would set packages behind a rock, plant, basket, pillar or something/anything that is on the porch so the creepers that drive down the streets looking for packages to steal dont see it before you are able to get it.
customer_reviews.author: Bubbs

customer_reviews.title: Keep Your Dog in Line
customer_reviews.text: This is a really solid leash. It is on the heavy side, but that is because it has a very robust locking mechanism that won't easily release without you pushing the button. The leash is a good length for allowing your dog to roam, or keeping them close by you. The poop bag holder attaches easily to the handle. To open, it unscrews, which makes it easier to replace the bags.
customer_reviews.author: A. Silverstone

customer_reviews.title: The locking mechanism is not that great. I use it for a 50# dog and ...
customer_reviews.text: The locking mechanism is not that great. I use it for a 50# dog and while it is adequate to give lead, it is only fair at the retracting function, as it does not seem to have enough power. The most concerning aspect though is that it is very challenging to lock it at times (most of the time), both when pressing the button to lock it momentarily, and trying to get the button to lock for a sustained period of time. I would not buy this again, nor would I recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Spar

customer_reviews.title: Nice sturdy leash
customer_reviews.text: Nice leash with a tape rather than a cord but a bit heavier than I expected. Its a bit bulky but seems very durable. Its the first tape versus a cord model I have owned and works just as well. No complaints other than size and weight versus the cord models. My dog is a mini-aussie that is not a puller of the leash and is well-mannered so my wife prefers a more lightweight shorter leash but I like the versatility of the length when she wants to walk a bit faster than I do.
customer_reviews.author: J. Kaspar

customer_reviews.title: Good customer service after issue
customer_reviews.text: *****Edited to add at bottom***** Decent leash while it worked. Everything still works except for the button. The spring broke so now when the dog pulls, it makes a ratcheting noise unless you can pull the button up so it free wheels. The warranty is only one year. Flexi leashes have a two year warranty and cost a few bucks more. ***EDITED: Vendor contacted me and sent a replacement leash at no charge. Their customer service made it right. ****
customer_reviews.author: redassaggie00

customer_reviews.title: Strong and durable.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this leash after my dog pulled on his last one so hard it snapped. Reading that this was for up to 110lbs in weight and works for powerful dogs, I knew this had to be the exact leash I needed for my...beagle. Taking him on a walk through the neighborhood is like being on a hunt is the countryside. The retractable leash is perfect for his exploring nose. I also like that handle being a bit on the big side, there’s enough room mittens and gloves during the NH winters.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this a month ago for my strong 75 lb. labrador. So far, so good. Retracts and locks easily, once you get a feel for the thumb switch. A word of caution : Wear a sturdy glove on your off-hand for reeling in your dog manually during unexpected lunging encounters. The nylon cord will slice the fingers like a hot razor. Not a manufacturer defect, but beware. I'd never used one of these before and only got sliced once to remember. So far, so good with everything else. Great way to take the "pull" out of long walks. Delivered on time and in working condition.
customer_reviews.author: mickey

customer_reviews.title: Defective item.
customer_reviews.text: I usually don't write reviews but I read many and I appreciate it. I have to write one about this item. I do not like this retractable leash. There are two main reasons. It's a button that you push to stop the dog from going any farther doesn't work right. I have a medium sized dog and when he wants something bad he can break loose of the button. The button is very awkward to use. The other item is if you're a man the hole that your fingers go into is too small. It barely fits when I don't have gloves on and when I do have gloves on there's just no way. Buyer beware!
customer_reviews.author: jim connley

customer_reviews.title: The break doesn't hold on this leash.  Constantly slips.
customer_reviews.text: The ribbon on this leash is too slippery with the reflective coating for the break to catch properly. Not a safe leash if you have a pulling dog. They either need to put better "teeth" on the break or go with a different ribbon. I have three dogs and only use this leash for the border collie because he is the smartest and stops instantly when I say so he doesn't really even need a leash. But I will never use it for the other two just because of the poor breaking system. Try again TaoTronics. This one is a failure.
customer_reviews.author: tracey, aurora colo

customer_reviews.title: ... fixed length leash before and this thing is the best solution for me
customer_reviews.text: Used a fixed length leash before and this thing is the best solution for me. There may be other solutions but I bought this as my first solution only to discover this is also my last solution. My dog likes to hang back, catch up then go ahead. That cycle repeats and this thing has worked flawlessly for me. Sure, every now and then when the leash is in the locked position I have to fiddle with it a bit to get it to release but other than that I'm totally satisfied with this thing. Also, I like the fact I can lock it to make a short leash incase someone is coming by that is squeamish about dogs.
customer_reviews.author: jr

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service and a good product
customer_reviews.text: Good leash, it does what it says it will do! It feels sturdy and doesn't seem like it will break, although my retriever doesn't pull hard or anything like that. The first one I got was broken from the day it arrived, it kind of worked but the lock button was really messed up and stuck and didn't unlock properly. I contacted the seller and they had a new one shipped out right away! Great customer service and a great dog leash.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Fleck

customer_reviews.title: ... a lot of play and you have to have pretty large hands to not need to use two hands ...
customer_reviews.text: The button to lock it has a lot of play and you have to have pretty large hands to not need to use two hands to lock it. It also doesn't hold if your dog even remotely pulls hard. Ended up putting it in the box of dog stuff that gets donated or thrown away.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew S Duquette

customer_reviews.title: Broke after 7 months of use.
customer_reviews.text: I take my dog on walks every single day for about an hour, so a good leash is important. She pulls a lot when other dogs are around, and it hasn't broken yet (6 months) The only thing that's annoying is the black rubber handle is starting to wear already. Black pieces fall off every other day. It's sort of annoying and now starts to get uncomfortable on my hands after a while. Still a good piece of machinery inside, but the outside could be better. Edit. It did break after about 7 months. Because of this I'm lowering to 3 stars. I'm going to try some other leashes to see if they can last longer.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: The lock is easy and quick to operate
customer_reviews.text: I got this to replace a 'smart' leash that automatically locks when my dog runs. Problem was the rewind spring was too weak, and it was hard to brake the tape on command. THIS leash is the opposite. The lock is easy and quick to operate. The rewind spring is strong. The tape is stiff so that it doesn't fold on itself and cause problems with the spool. It's build solidly and inspires confidence. I checked the ratings before I ordered, and it has not disappointed. All the parts work, and I've had no breakage. I highly recommend this leash.
customer_reviews.author: gus

customer_reviews.title: On number 2!
customer_reviews.text: Was excited about this leash since I have a sniffy hound dog. It worked great until one day it would retract all the way. Last about 2-3 months. Disappointed with the quality. UPDATE 7/16/19: I received a free replacement leash based on my initial review. They made contact with me first and offered a replacement. It took a few weeks to get the replacement but overall I'm happy with the customer service. I have had the replacement for a few months now and it has held up better than the first. Overall I would recommend this leash.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Eyer

customer_reviews.title: Great for stubborn puppy
customer_reviews.text: I like it, my dog not so much... My dog is cute but a total jerk at night. She knows I want to go to bed after the news. She often refuses to come back in. So I bought this. She gets a generous 16 ft to roam and 5 min to do so. Then she is reeled in. Like a giant shark. (Or whatever fish that weighs 80 pounds). She is dislpeased but I am pleased so 5 star for this product
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer M

customer_reviews.title: Love turned to Loathe
customer_reviews.text: UPDATED REVIEW I loved this leash at first. The first one I had for over a year, once it broke I wasn't too upset as it wasn't expensive and I used it daily. However, the second one I bought lasted about 6 months and the rubber on the handle started coming off within a few weeks of use. I'm not sure why locking mechanism decided to break this time around but I won't be buying another. Absolutely the best leash I've ever had. It's a great quality and it's so nice to let my dog roam a bit farther since I walk kind of slow. Could not be happier.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Great Leash!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great leash! The ribbon leash instead of a rope leash helps avoid rope burn when caught around legs (human and dog) and also allows for a smooth retract and no knots! The grip and locking button are nice and I havent had any problems with jams of any sort. I have a pretty strong lab/shepherd mix and I can easily control him when passing the occasional squirrel or cat on our walks. The light that came with the leash is nice though my dog turns it off/on when he scratches himself. It is waterproof though and fairly bright.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah K

customer_reviews.title: Joy has returned to our walks. Thanks!
customer_reviews.text: I had some nice leather leashes for the dogs. Somehow I bought them at different lengths. This made walking them very awkward. Also the pups are used to hanging out in the backyard, so walking them was not a lot of fun. My fault entirely, so I bought two of these leashes. We went to the local park yesterday. The joy of walking my dogs has returned! The leashes are well made, smooth upon going out and coming back in and the entire unit is sturdy. Thanks for the poop bag holders as well. Gotta go cause we are headed out for another walk.
customer_reviews.author: beck n sf

customer_reviews.title: Lease stopped rewinding after 10 uses
customer_reviews.text: This is garbage. After about 10 walks the leash would not rewind into the case anymore. I tried to take it apart to rewind but removing the two screws is useless. The case appears glued together. By the time I got to the spool with the leash by prying at the case with a screw driver, the case was in pieces.
customer_reviews.author: Bradley Irby

customer_reviews.title: it's Ok
customer_reviews.text: it is ok. The reason I gave it 3 starts is because it will "skip" at times if my dog pulls when the leash is locked ( she is about 50Lbs) the trash bag holder gets loose a lot and I almost lost it a couple of times. It is a decent product for the price, but you might want to invest in something sturdier if you have a larger dog.
customer_reviews.author: ABSTER

customer_reviews.title: Durable leash, great tape length
customer_reviews.text: We've went through multiple retractable leashes in the last few months with our 75lb puppy and the mechanism always breaks. This leash seems to be more durable than the previous ones we've had. The handle could have a little bigger opening; it's fine for now because I have small hands, but I anticipate wearing gloves in winter with this leash may be a challenge and those with larger hands than mine might struggle. Overall great for the price though! Love the bag carrier, it is more secure on the handle than leashes we've had in the past also.
customer_reviews.author: Katie Hansen

customer_reviews.title: i find the handle a bit small for a man's hand
customer_reviews.text: My hands are not extraordinarily large for man, but the handle seems cramped, like my fingers are pressed uncomfortably together. My older leash (different brand) had a larger handle, it was a better fit for my hand. I would think any man with slightly above average hand size might find this uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.author: BigRedAbraham

customer_reviews.title: Durable!
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this for 5 years with an 85 pound Lab. I've never had a retractable leash last this long under this much abuse. it's comfortable in the hand. This ribbon style lead is preferable to the rope style that I've had in the past. Just be sure you are proficient with the locking mechanism.. as people say, if you're not coordinated they can be dangerous...
customer_reviews.author: Michael DGW

customer_reviews.title: This leash is perfect. My BF just rescued a dog and we ...
customer_reviews.text: This leash is perfect. My BF just rescued a dog and we needed a leash. Of course, we went to a big box pet store, and it was $30+ for a retractable leash. Heck no! So, amazon saves the day. This is PERFECT. His doggo isn't a very hard puller, although he will tug quite a bit (to the point where we only use the harness because the collar chokes him) and the leash holds up! It is a great length, and came with the bag attachment. I love that it locks and has grips.
customer_reviews.author: jl9988Top Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: The seller is so nice and contact me for product survey
customer_reviews.text: I first ordered this product at the beginning of March but my order was lost due to the delivery process problem. Amazon resent the item again to me. I found the one I received was some kind of soft for the retraction force. The seller is so nice and contact me for product survey. After they learn the case. they gave me another new one because they said the old one might be defected. Now I just received the new one with very good quality! It works very good with my dog. I love it. Thanks to the wonderful seller.
customer_reviews.author: Yongqing Zhang

customer_reviews.title: Works perfect and has had no issues.  Walks are so much better now!
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my new dog. It is perfect and easy to get the collar on with just a clip. The dog waste bag holder is great and ensures I never forget. She loves having the freedom to get away and I can easily lock and stop her whenever I need to which is great. Quality is great and I am super happy with this. Even the dog waste holder is great quality and the screw on top goes on perfect. I have never had the leash tangle and no issues at all. Super happy.
customer_reviews.author: David Bradshaw

customer_reviews.title: Great dog leash!!!
customer_reviews.text: Great dog leash!! It is of good quality and very well made. I love the fact that the leash part is all flat, thick, ribbon type leash and does not have any string/cord that gives rope burns. It also has a reflective-ness to it. It fits nicely in my hand and has a very comfortable, solid feel. I have an 80+ pound dog and they leash stop works well. A well built, excellent quality product that I highly recommend. The attachable doggie-do bag holder is pretty cool too. This is my second purchase as my dog chewed through the first one when my friend used it to tie him up =p. Without hesitation I ordered another!
customer_reviews.author: djib

customer_reviews.title: Great for long walks with my dog
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace a different brand retractable leash that was broken after about a year of use. The price of the previous leash was similar, and so I didn't have high expectations that this would last long or be of good quality, but I am happy to say I was wrong! This is a great quality, and durable leash! I take my 40lb dog for a minimum of two walks a day. I've been using this leash for almost a year now and it still works great! I'm very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn

customer_reviews.title: Good product design undone by quality of the leash strap
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for our 4 month old chocolate lab. The design and feel of the grip is good and mechanism for leash release ia fine. BUT - my pip was able to nearly chew through the leash strap in 10 minutes. Most similar plain leashes can stand up to some chewing without issue. This is kind of a deal breaker if your dog tends to chew the leash. Probably would not buy again unless strap quality improves or my pup stops chewing...
customer_reviews.author: Chender

customer_reviews.title: So nice had to buy it twice
customer_reviews.text: So nice had to buy it twice! Strong leash and can endure pulling from strong dogs. Left it on the roof of my car, drove off and realized my mistake a while later. Went back to the area and it was gone so ended up purchasing another one. Only negative is the hook is on the smaller side and on the surface doesn't appear to be as sturdy as some others, but has held up fine and definitely not a deal breaker.
customer_reviews.author: Shadee

customer_reviews.title: Mine has lasted over a year
customer_reviews.text: I have had this dog leash for ever a year now and it still works just like it did when I first purchased it. It hasn't messed up at all. I have two cocker spaniels and a jack russell terrier, so they aren't very big. Also my dogs don't often pull very hard. I'm not sure if a large dog would wear the leash out faster. My only negative is that I find the leash to be heavy and awkward for me. My husband loves it, but he has much larger hands.
customer_reviews.author: Serena Reed

customer_reviews.title: Cant beat the value
customer_reviews.text: I was suspect at the price, but this is a great leash. My dog is 60-70 pounds and he pulls, no issues yet. Im 6’3” so my hand is a little cramped in the opening, but its not too bad. So those with XL hands and bigger might have an issue. It comes with a little baggie holder, I recommend a ziptie to fasten it if you're going to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Jon

customer_reviews.title: WOW!  Impressed!
customer_reviews.text: I am really impressed with this dog leash. We had spent so much money on cheaper versions just to have them break and when our last one did, I said I was going to invest in a quality one but also, one that stayed within the price range I wanted. Upon arrival, the package alone was impressive and thought out. The weight of this leash is impressive too. It feels sturdy. The retractable cord is impressive and super sturdy as well. I highly recommend this leash. It is a great product at a great price!
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Law

customer_reviews.title: Buying a 2nd one today
customer_reviews.text: EDIT: After about 4 months the inside gears were out on my 75 lb dog. The second one I bought did the same thing. Did not do it with 55 lb dog, so that is why I only took away 1 star. Good for medium dogs. Awesome leash, retracts very well. Buying a 2nd one today for my other dog, the first one worked well with my 85 lb American Bully (lots of strength). Great product guys, one review I read said the handle was too large....I find the handle hole tight for my large hands, but still very sturdy and usable.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy

customer_reviews.title: Great leash, minus 1 star for minor issue
customer_reviews.text: I've used it a few times now and it works well. The retract is far stronger than the one I bought at the local store and does a good job of keeping up with my 8 month old dog's zigzag walking pattern. With the old leash the retract would always fall behind resulting in the dog stepping over the leash. Deducted 1 star because the handle opening needs to be slightly larger for people with large hands.
customer_reviews.author: JayS

customer_reviews.title: Could be better.
customer_reviews.text: I liked this retractable dog leash when I first got it. Looks very modern and feels stury. Two complaints - the first is that the hook that attached to the dogs collar or harness seems very undersized. For the amount of weight it's supposed to hold, the hook looks awfully small. Two, the handle is just not big enough. I admit I have large hands but this particular leash hurts my hand after walking my dogs for a while. They tend to pull a little when they see other animals and because this handle is so tight on my hand, it actually hurts them. Never had this experience with any other retractable leash.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: 5 stars for customer service, 2 stars for product.
customer_reviews.text: The first one i bought was blue, and it broke down in couple weeks by regular use on a 3 month old German Shepherd Puppy! Well, the customer service was really great, they replaced it for free and hopefully the newer design on Orange will last longer. 5 stars for customer service, 2 stars for the product.
customer_reviews.author: Ralph Bai

customer_reviews.title: Great Product with 12-month warranty
customer_reviews.text: We have bought many retractable leashes over the years. And this is the first one that came with 12-month warranty. We have had the leash for two weeks and no problems. A couple of the other brands we bought only lasted a day. So we currently happy with this one. I just received an email from the company this morning explaining the warranty. So nice to receive a nice personal-able email from a company. That tells me they care about customer service. I would recommend this leash and this company.
customer_reviews.author: RoseMarie Wallace

customer_reviews.title: REALLY THE BEST RETRACTABLE LEASH. SOFT FABRIC, BIG HANDLES. HIGH QUALITY
customer_reviews.text: WHAT A DEAL I am buying this again. 2nd one. I highly recommend this RETRACTABLE leash the quality is amazing and it is well built. I love the fabric leash tape vs those nylons. This is a must have and especially the low price. I can easily buy another just to keep extra.
customer_reviews.author: KP

customer_reviews.title: 3+ years and still going strong.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this in July of 2016. Really didn't think I'd get this much use out of it, but 3+ years later it's still going strong. It's used with a golden retriever that pulls like a tractor. It's seen salt water and lots of abuse. Sometimes a little difficult to get the lock to engage, but always works out. Will definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: CB

customer_reviews.title: Loses Retractability
customer_reviews.text: I have an 80-lb pup who isn't really a puller, except for when he sees one of his friends he's dying to say hi to. I have had this leash since February and it is still intact, however, it does NOT always retract and the brake button does not really keep it "locked". This to me is very unsafe and for this reason I gave it 2 stars only. Price, ease of use and comfort- all great. Having an unsafe, not-always retractable, unreliable brake button- deal breakers!
customer_reviews.author: Lmlwilliams

customer_reviews.title: The handle is also too small for my husband to hold comfortably. It just does not feel very safe for ...
customer_reviews.text: There is not enough tension on the tape while the dog is walking and the rate of retraction is so slow that the tape often hits the ground. The brake button is hard to reach and you have to push it quite far to engage fully. The handle is also too small for my husband to hold comfortably. It just does not feel very safe for our 75lb dog. It is very cheap though, which I guess makes sense after using it. It is totally worth it to pay extra for the flexi brand retractable leashes - we ordered one after using this for two days.
customer_reviews.author: Rose Chase

customer_reviews.title: I originally got this for a lab puppy I was ...
customer_reviews.text: I originally got this for a lab puppy I was going to get. I ended up deciding on a bichon. He's now around 5 months old, and for the first 2 months or so, this leash worked perfectly. Diego is around 11 lbs - so by no means is he a big guy. And already the leash is broken! The lock mechanism doesn't stay and I'm so worried he's going to get hurt and run into traffic or something while we're on walks with our toddlers. I'm hoping this is just a defect as the product worked very well at first. Sigh.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Abrigana

customer_reviews.title: Great leash.  Works well for big dogs.
customer_reviews.text: I've never been a fan of the long leashes, especially for bigger dogs. I think they're cheesy and the handle is bulky and heavy. That said, I recently moved into an apartment, and have to take my dog out every time she needs to go. This leash is great, as it gives her ten more feet of room to roam so she can find the right spot. Ha. Anyway, it's worked great so far, and I like how the leash is a tape style rather than a wire like some of these types of leashes, making it easy to see the leash and somebody won't accidentally trip over it if it's extended tight.
customer_reviews.author: Buffs Fan

customer_reviews.title: Leash broke after 3 months
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately I must have received a lemon because the leash broke after 3 months. I did like the design and ergonomics of the handle and the leash part retracted so easily. However after 3 months of using, it just came apart one day while I was out walking my dog. Thank goodness he didn’t run off into the street. I really wanted to leave a good review but maybe I just got a lemon.
customer_reviews.author: kristy le

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price.
customer_reviews.text: As a lead it works well. The leash extends and retracts trouble free and I have not had any issues with the lock disengaging like I have experienced with other brands. As for the negatives the bag holder interferes with the comfort of the handle somewhat. I use this on a harness for a Siberian Husky and the harness ring barely fits into the opening of the snap hook. I think the hook should be bigger and it is sometimes a nuisance if the dog is restless at the door.
customer_reviews.author: That Guy

customer_reviews.title: Works well - a bit Heavy
customer_reviews.text: I like this leash, it works well. The only issue I have with it is it is a little heavier than ones I have had in the past. I was a little worried when I started using it that the weight would make walking the dog uncomfortable, but it hasn't seemed to have been a problem. It is great for my small 20lb dog. I bought one for a friend also, and her dog really likes it, but she was able to chew through the chord very easily (the dog, not the friend).
customer_reviews.author: Monica Alexander

customer_reviews.title: Small handle hole for gloved hands.
customer_reviews.text: I was replacing an old retractable dog leash which had broken on me. Searched the Amazon site for the best rated by Amazon purchasers. This one popped up. Read the reviews and it sounded good to me. When it arrived I gave it a workout. The problem I encountered is that using this leash in the winter with gloves makes it most difficult to get one's hand into the handle opening, at least for me. So exercise caution if you are going to use this leash with gloves in the winter and you have large hands.
customer_reviews.author: Mark In The Mountains

customer_reviews.title: It is heavy and the plastic seems better than the cheap ABS used on our last (now ...
customer_reviews.text: Initial impressions are this is a well built leash. It is heavy and the plastic seems better than the cheap ABS used on our last (now broken) leash. It has some good weight to it which may indicate the retraction mechanism contains heavy, durable springs. The only negative/neutral comment I can make is the webbing on the leash makes an annoying noise if it retracts quickly.
customer_reviews.author: adison

customer_reviews.title: Good quality leash.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been through a couple retractable leashes and right away I could tell the quality in this one was way better. I also spent less on it than others I’ve bought in the past. I have a 20 pound piglet/dog that pulls to his hearts content and this has held up so far. The retractor feels nice and heavy duty and pulls back in without any problems.
customer_reviews.author: Sara M.

customer_reviews.title: The whole line is nylon and is fairly loud but solid Leash
customer_reviews.text: Pros: *Does exactly what you expect it to. *Solidly built *Decent length leash Cons: *Handle is too small for my larger hands (6'1" man with larger hands) especially if you add the 💩 bag dispenser. *It uses a Nylon strap from start to stop. I should have looked before buying it because I really prefer the round cables. They are quieter, move throughout the leash handle easier and are far less likely to get tangled.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

product_meta.title: TaoTronics Retractable Dog Leash, 16 ft Dog Walking Leash for Medium Large Dogs up to 110lbs, Tangle Free, One Button Break & Lock , Dog Waste Dispenser and Bags included
product_meta.description:
TaoTronics - Enhance Your Life
Enjoy life to the fullest with TaoTronics. From industry-leading LED lighting solutions to home goods and audio devices, we put users at the center of our decisions and design products that address life’s needs and help you make the most of your daily activities. 

Technical Specifications: 
Dimensions: 6.1 x 4.2 x 1.4in (15.5 x 10.7 x 3.6cm) 
Weight: 0.82lb (371g) 

What’s in the Box: 
1 x Dog Leash (Model: TT-PA001) 
1 x Dog Waste Bag Dispenser
feature_bullets: Walk your dog freely in open area with one hand braking, release and recoiling system, which allows the dog leash to be adjusted to a comfortable length with ease
Retractable dog leash nylon tape extends up to 16 ft, strong and durable, made for daily use, with a strong spring for smoothly retracting dog leash
Durable ABS plastic casing with ergonomic grip and anti-slip handle fits in your hand like a glove
For any types of dog with up to 110lbs in weight, this retractable leash works for powerful large dogs, as well as medium sized and smaller dogs, giving them maximum freedom while under your control
Comes with a free roll of plastic bags tucked in a bone-shaped cone for you to quickly clean up the mess your pooch leaves on those untimely occasions

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
